text: @PRL_Jones @EnvAgency HMRC told me that the @EnvAgency were ‚Äúunhelpful‚Äù. There is a separate issue regarding a senior EA officer facilitating waste crime involving the loss of close to ¬£2m of LFT +VAT. The EA is trying very hard not to deal with this by refusing to interview those with the evidence!

@MarkAvery @NFUtweets @MoorlandAssoc @CLAtweets @BASCnews @DefraGovUK @TonyJuniper @NaturalEngland @EnvAgency @ForestryEngland @nature_scot Very interesting blog for today... altho I've some reservations about the re-intro of Dragons in our #Rewilding plans ; will only work if we #BanDGS ... otherwise those arsonist #KillerKeepers may capture some to train for their scorched earth policy! #BanTheBurn 
@waronwildlife https://t.co/EEH7EGgMl9

RT @EnvAgency: Martin Hughes and his wife were flooded on Boxing Day 2015

He tells us his story of what it‚Äôs like to be flooded and shares‚Ä¶

@lakesauctioneer @EnvAgency Just when i think i have moved on from being fined by @Ruralpay for not having cut hay that was flooded by the adjacent sewage laden river. 

Apparently I should either have not claimed I was going to cut hay because in the end I didnt, or sent in an MTA 10 days before it flooded
@EnvAgency It was reported yesterday but the pollution is even worse today
RT @MarkAvery: Olaf Lipor, our regular guest blogger & prominent Scandinavian scientist, shares thoughts on rewilding.  Why are we so timid‚Ä¶
RT @CIWEM: CIWEM is proud to be the recipient of an award to design, develop and deliver accredited PFR training on behalf of the Environme‚Ä¶

RT @EnvAgency: Are you a registered waste carrier?

We‚Äôve developed a simple online tool that you can add to your website to show you're re‚Ä¶

@PRL_Jones Your comment about hazardous waste made me smile. Near here after the @EnvAgency waste crime team found hazardous waste being used to manufacture compost, they allowed it, after being classified as hazardous, to be used for restoration of an inert landfill. LFT = ¬£0!

@GrahamH_Staffs @StinkStopthe @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @JamesBevanEA @EnvAgency @RedIndustries2 I'm coming around to this idea. It's never been about compensation, however something needs to sort this quickly. Figures wise it should be calculated on the lost value of property and individual harms caused to health and wellbeing since the issue was first reported.
@EnvAgencyNW @sthelenscouncil Any update on the cause of this?
